document.heading: Criminal Justice Supervisory Board Act of 1978

history.narrative: Law 1-69, the “Criminal Justice Supervisory Board Act of 1978,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-211 which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary and the Committee on Criminal Law. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 24, 1976 and March 9, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 29, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-102 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
